name: Streets of Rage 2: Syndicate Wars
overview: Streets of Rage 2: Syndicate Wars, is a groundbreaking hack developed by Red Crimson with help from gsaurus and Daors. It allows you to play 2 new modes, survival and coop with a CPU partner! Play as or with any character in the game, including bosses, thugs, and Adam Hunter from the original Streets of Rage. That's 23 playable characters! No enemy characters are modified, they play just as they appear in the original Streets of Rage 2 game. All characters are selectable on the new added character select screen. New difficulties are available in the options menu.
